desc.en: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.jp: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 纱织的加入让聚集在一起的阿里乌斯战术小队也回应了老师的召集。姐妹会和救护骑士团在第4圣所待机。尽管攻略第5圣所的过程中遇到了困境，但后来温泉开发部和被释放的小雪伸出了援手。接着第6圣所也完成了居民的避难处理。仁耶向忍术研究部转达前往雪原搜索百花缭乱部长的任务。

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社回报称，由于霍德钻进了堡垒都市地下，而那里被莉央的系统保护着，无法探测；他们正在破译密码，但耗时会比较长。真纪听后有点惊讶，但诺亚让真纪继续专注于第一圣所。

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.

desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.jp: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第86首曲子，其在与“霍德”(Hod)战斗时使用。在编程中，“未定义行为”是指执行某种计算机代码所产生的结果，这种代码在当前程序状态下的行为在其所使用的语言标准中没有规定。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.zh_cn: 就在众人准备对第六圣所进行攻略时，众人发现其他被破坏了的圣所再次出现极高的能量反应。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.jp: 五個聖所全都消滅了，但能量全都集中在第6個聖所。在「最後聖所」進行決戰，現在命運全都取決於陽葵拿出的祕密武器。

desc.en: 陽葵突然說自己有祕密武器。英美有些不解。千尋解釋說，陽葵認為聖所的能量應該可以使一個東西在三分鐘內擴大化。就在陽葵物色該擴大什麼的時候，老師有了主意。
desc.jp: 陽葵突然說自己有祕密武器。英美有些不解。千尋解釋說，陽葵認為聖所的能量應該可以使一個東西在三分鐘內擴大化。就在陽葵物色該擴大什麼的時候，老師有了主意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠突然说自己有秘密武器。艾米有些不解。千寻解释说，日鞠认为圣所的能量应该可以使一个东西在三分钟内扩大化。就在日鞠物色该扩大什么的时候，老师有了主意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵突然说自己有秘密武器。英美有些不解。千寻解释说，阳葵认为圣所的能量应该可以使一个东西在三分钟内扩大化。就在阳葵物色该扩大什么的时候，老师有了主意。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。
